website_summaries.verdict: Although there's nothing fancy about this hot plate, it's compact, durable, and an inexpensive deal.
pros: Has a very simple design that makes it extremely easy to use
Temperature dial has variable heat settings for different cooking needs
cons: Somewhat underpowered compared to pricier models, so it takes a little time to heat up and cook

customer_reviews.title: Life-Saving Starter Burner
customer_reviews.text: My apartment has a microwave, no stove, and this little mini fridge for a kitchen. A week after moving in and subsisting only on microwaved burritos and Trader Joes frozen enchiladas, I desperately bought this burner on Amazon with the fastest ship possible. Two months later, it has held up through omelets, four hour beans, pancake batter spills, and pretty much all the crusty kitchen remnants I have drip dropped and drapped its way. For the college student, the poor freelancer living in a box of a room and sleeping on the floor, the newlyweds attempting to start a life, this is your burner. Cleans great, light, easy, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: We are currently stuck without an oven and have been using this baby now for about a month. It works very well and can handle big pots without sliding around. It's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Challender

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with  good price.
customer_reviews.text: This fifth burner that I bought was it to use it outside of the house in my patio. It is an excellent burner and becomes a full function in 30 seconds. (see the video). The element will be about 850° F at that time. Proctor Silex 34103 Electric Single Burner, Compact and Portable, Adjustable Temperature . A great alternative to the gas burner. I use it outside on my patio, especially when it is windy. Today's price at amazon, com $13.49 with coupon (9/14/2019)  Wipes clean Compact countertop design Adjustable temperature A stainless steel drip pan Power light
customer_reviews.author: SebastianUSA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in our RV this summer at camp. We tried it at home this past week and it heated right up and cooked our breakfast eggs in the same way our stove- top would. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Defective, burner does not power off.
customer_reviews.text: Spend more for a better product. I just received my proctor Silex burner and immediately tested it out. It gets hot very quickly, but it will not power off. I turn the knob to the off position and the light stays on and continues to heat up. The only way to power it off is to unplug it. It's so cheap it's not worth returning. Between defective products and the horribly slow/freezing Amazon shopping app, I will be canceling my prime membership and shopping elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Great Burner
customer_reviews.text: Redoing our kitchen and wanted to be able to cook or heat up simple things during the many weeks of renovation. So far this burner is great! It heats up quickly and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Does boil a pot of water, but takes a while
customer_reviews.text: I tried several of these cooking burners. The ones from Target and Walmart would turn off and on at the highest setting, pehapsntonprevent overheating. I wasn't able to boil water with those. This one seems to also turn off, but after 16 minutes I did manage to boil a pot of water to cook pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Dmh529

customer_reviews.title: Was already opened.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the product yet, but I paid for a NEW burner, and it was very obvious that someone else had used and returned it. The box is sliced and taped over, and I wouldn't really mind if I had bought it for myself, but I bought it as a Christmas gift, and considering I paid $23 for it, I was expecting more. If I wanted to give my friend a used product, I would have went to good will and spent $3 instead of $23.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Marx

customer_reviews.title: Not Powerful Enough
customer_reviews.text: This burner did not regulate temperature well at all. Bought for candy making, so had a candy thermometer measuring heat at all times. Couldn’t even get candy up to 300 degrees Fahrenheit due to unit shutting on and off (the unit seems to be functioning as intended—the on/off is an attempt to regulate the set temp). The unit is not powerful enough to heat to a specified temp. Three stars because it would probably work to heat up your mac and cheese, but is untrustworthy for candy and other temp-specific cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Does not give out enough heat to even boil water. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Hope

customer_reviews.title: Camper approved!
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazingly on our camping trip. It was WAY too hot to cook over the campfire, so this little burner saved the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Molls

customer_reviews.title: Very low heat threshold
customer_reviews.text: This product would not even boil water in the pan. Pancakes were white instead of brown, even on high heat! Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The burner was bought for a temporary cook station, while our kitchen was being remodeled. It had a couple of annoying features right out of the box. The control knob is small, with a temperature marking on its face that was difficult to read. The bright red power light is on all the time the unit is plugged in. There was no light to indicate that a set temperature was reached. And after around two weeks of use, the temperature control would not go to full power. Do not buy. There are far better burners out there for about the same price. Just head to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: duncan culver

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent heating
customer_reviews.text: The heating element works and sometime not working at all. I do not know why!!
customer_reviews.author: HAMIDREZA SAMADI

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. I only wish they would have made ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I only wish they would have made it so that the light goes off when the burner is turned to the off position.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Peranteau

customer_reviews.title: Element Burnt Out in 2 Mins!
customer_reviews.text: The heating element worked for the first 2 minutes and then burnt out half way. It will not heat up to boil anything and it was a waste of money. I ordered this product because I had issues with my kitchen and I am without a stove. I am very disappointed in the product I received. Margo
customer_reviews.author: margo7171

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was my second attempt at a countertop stove burner. My first attmept was  which began to die a slow death after a few weeks and was completely dead at 5 months. It took forever to heat up, and also, forever to cool down. This proctor-silex cost less than 1/2 of the other one and doesn't look nearly as impressive. But it heats up really fast. Absolutely no problem bringing water to a boil. I guess if you're trying to boil several gallons of water in a huge pot, it would take awhile. But I have no complaints in that regard. It also cools down really quickly. Wish I had gone with this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Faith 99

customer_reviews.title: Good hot plate with one exception
customer_reviews.text: I like this hot plate vs. my old one where spill-overs seeped into the unit below and was hard to clean. This one with its square base is more stable and easy to clean. And it's very reasonable. BUT... one thing: the metal base holding the coil gets very hot, so don't touch it or try to move it when it's on. You'll burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a used one
customer_reviews.text: I paid for the price of a NEW one. They gave me one that was clearly used and returned. I'm very upset about that and know I'm not the only one this has happened to. It doesnt turn off by the knob so you have to unplug it which seems unsafe if you wernt aware of it. It heats up nicely and will get the job done though. 3 stars because they gave me a used one when I paid full price and it doesnt turn off by knob.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already Opened & Used!
customer_reviews.text: This product was NOT new! It was clearly used and then returned! I paid for a NEW product!! This is extremely dishonest and unprofessional!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light ON all the time
customer_reviews.text: ON light stays on all the time which makes it completely useless as a signaling device.
customer_reviews.author: FourEyes

customer_reviews.title: We have used it a lot and had no problems
customer_reviews.text: This was $19 when I purchased it on Amazon, just a couple of months ago. It works great, however when I decided to order another one for backup, I noticed that they were asking $30 for the same one now. So, I ordered a different brand just because I didn't like the giant price increase. Well, we wished we had just ordered another one of these and paid the $30.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after ConEd shut down the gas in my building because of a leak and I could no longer use my gas stove. (Hoping that's temporary.) I use it every day to boil water for (pour-over) coffee. And the dial really does control the level of heat, even though it's not marked, so I can fry eggs, sauté burgers, make shrimp scampi, etc. It's not as sleek as some of the fancier products my neighbors have purchased, but I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Punky Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned several hot plates before trying this one. I am very happy with my purchase. I have cast iron pans and a glass top stove which scratches easily. So this was a great solution to use with my cast iron cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple cheap works
customer_reviews.text: Simple cheap works. It’s cheap it’s simple and it works we actually turned a refrigerator into a hotbox for a dinner theater burlesque restaurant by plugging this into a thermostat and that we can keep our food warm before we serve it to her customers it’s been working for a couple months it’s late it cleans up well it’s not the greatest thing in the entire world but for the love of Pete is cheap definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent price works okay
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Certainly not the strongest, but adequate. At the price it's nice. I think what would have made it better for me is a smaller skillet so more of the pan is heated at the same time. Not the fault of the burner, but it's a handy tip if you get this.
customer_reviews.author: Wholly_Cats

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE BURNER
customer_reviews.text: I USE THIS BURNER EVERY DAY SINCE MY RANGE TOP BROKE AND I'M WAITING TO REPLACE IT. BECAUSE THE DRIP PAN CAN NOT BE REMOVED FROM THE UNIT IT IS DIFFICULT TO CLEAN ,CAN ONLY BE WIPED DOWN. BUT IT IS A WORK HORSE. GLAD I CHOSE THIS BRAND AND THIS MODEL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for. Gets as hot as a stove burner. You can cook anything and use a full size pot or pan.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: I love this little I am going to buy another one so I have double burners and will be cheaper than buying one unit with two burners recommend to buy to all Update 08 07 2020 Quit working can't find anywhere to honor the warranty. Put in trash While it worked was a 6️⃣ star
customer_reviews.author: Ladyofd

customer_reviews.title: Simple straight forward good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was a lightning deal because the other burner I was using gave off super obnoxious smells that can't possibly be healthy to be breathing in. This one doesn't do that at all. I was worried it was my pan, but no it was the burner.
customer_reviews.author: J. Victor

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to cook!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use while our kitchen was being remodeled. I have to say that I hated using it very much but it did the job. I am used to gas so this could have been part of the problem but it took forever to cook. It did boil water fast.
customer_reviews.author: resqchick

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Simple, uncomplicated. seems to work OK. Cons: The power light stays on ALL THE TIME. I assume the unit is turned off when you turn it all the way down and hear that slight click, but without a way to know for sure, you'll be anxious when you see that power light on. Upshot: I wouldn't buy this again, but I got it refurbished and cheap so it was a deal.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Note that it said no more than 1 hour I am going to use it for hotpot, and it is going to be more than 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: Tinaberry

customer_reviews.title: Ideal and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I took this to a meeting where I used it to heat up chocolate milk for a Cocoa Bar. It worked very well. Much faster than trying to make it in a crock pot. I anticipate I will have more use for it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LeDon Young

customer_reviews.title: A back up burner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this burner as an extra burner when the kitchen stove is totally in use. I am also planning to use it with a generator in case of a power outage. I tested it when I received it and know that it will meet my expectations. For now, it is boxed and ready. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahP

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little burner. Works well for my double boiler for my business. Heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

customer_reviews.title: Simple.  Inexpensive.  Does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a terrible cook. I'm getting rid of my stove/oven. In it's place will go my microwave and countertop oven, on a DIY baker's rack, clearing the countertop for 'pretty' things. This thingy works well to boil the kettle, fry up eggs and bacon, and now and then, maybe something dangerous, like spaghetti or a grilled cheese sandwich. But, it's not the large burner size I thought. And, it doesn't get very hot. This is safer, for me though. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ready when you are
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to clean under the burner because it does not come off. I had to mark the dial for medium heat because you have to really look at it closely. I still rate it a five because it’s easy to use and readily available. It does the job for me. I just plug it in and start cooking.
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The best fifth burner I ever purchased. So far so good. I expect a fifth burner to last at least a year. This one seems to be of superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: maya provence

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay hot.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and used it to boil some water for a recipe and it kept cooling off. That made it take twice as long to boil the water. I am probably going to return it as I was really dissatisfied with it, It was a gift so that made it worse! I would never buy this again! The dial is not marked either.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Seiber

customer_reviews.title: Conveniet
customer_reviews.text: The single plate burner was had a lower price than others so I was skeptical, however, we used it in our RV for an entire season of living in and it performed well. It was easy to boil or simmer foods. It seems durable enough for our needs. It is small yet holds our kettles. We opted for an electric frying pan, however, for frying foods as the base isn't wide enough for some even frying of foods.
customer_reviews.author: TireTracksUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Heats up Quickly
customer_reviews.text: We had a kitchen fire so i ordered this until my new stove came. This little plate saved the day. I continue to use it, as it has a good steady heat and a nice low heat as well. Great for a potluck to keep a casserole warm or for fondue at the table. I highly reccomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: wild wild woman

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product. It doesn’t heat up very hot. Took me 4 hours to cook up some bacon. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: It works well. It just takes a little while to get to the point of boiling.
customer_reviews.text: That this was very light and worked. It had a decent length of cord in which to plug it into the wall. However it Took a very long time to heat up a small amount of water To the point of boiling. It did work overall though and it worked for what I needed so thank you
customer_reviews.author: DD Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this burner!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this burner’s heat output and temperature control. Will boil vigorously or barely simmer anything of reasonable size. This one was a great choice for me for use in my tractor with power inverter, where I must keep within rated wattage loads. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: av8r

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective, nothing fancy, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm for making tea and warming pots at a cabin without a kitchen. It gets really hot. And it warms fast. I recommend it as it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: HatsWayne

customer_reviews.title: Made of metal
customer_reviews.text: No plastic. I plugged it in and made it get real hot to burn off the oil left on the burner. It got plenty hot during my test and no need to further test it. This is for my RV. If there are any problems, I will follow up. ETA: cooked some eggs, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JX

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: So helpful and great to have. Our stove broke and we didnt have enough to buy a new one. This product really helped us through a rough month and now we have extra burners for holiday cooking that I can stick back in the closet afterwards. Just wish it got a little hotter. Takes awhile to boil water.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a studio apartment
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for a studio apartment. I did not have the room for a full size stove and got two of these. They work great and saved me lots of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tere E

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My range is gas and even on lowest burner settings, I have trouble with scorching when simmering sauces & milk-based soups. This electric burner has more variable heat adjustments and works perfectly in those instances. Very handy, I can store it out of the way when not in use; conversely, I have full use of my cooktop while simmering off to one side with this electric burner on counter top. Very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mclemore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent work horse burner with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: Presumably the light on this burner is only supposed to be on when the burner, but mine stays on all time. Otherwise, though, a good product at a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: Montague Catway

customer_reviews.title: Great Burner for Porch Cooking
customer_reviews.text: This burner works perfectly for cooking fish, a steak or collards on the back porch rather than smelling and smoking up the kitchen. Burners glow red and are adjustable. The are able to heat up a medium size frying pan to a very high temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie fm NC

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I use them constantly. They are quick, easy to use and clean, efficient, save on electricity, are portable, and just meet all my needs. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Evening Iris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This single burner unit is perfect for use at my office - we can now cook something decent to eat instead of being enslaved to local take out :) Clean up easily, heats up quickly and if the instructions are followed you will be well satisfied. The only improvement I would suggest is to put markings on the selection dial so you can tell what heat setting you are selecting instead of taking a wild guess.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our 5th wheel. We weren't happy with an induction cooktop. Needed something for light cooking and coffee making and heating beyond the micro and convection.. It gets hot quick. My wife likes it. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Prefect little burner
customer_reviews.text: My stove went out really and wasn’t not prepare to buy a new one so I’m using this little burner in the meantime and it’s working out great. I actually bought two different burning and this one is my favorite. The temperature control is great. It heats up great. My other one takes a long time time to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: The worst coal burner I’ve ever had! The coals fall right off of it and onto the counter or floor burning them. Ruined my brand new $7,000 flooring and burned two holes in my counter tops. Never had this problem with any other coal burner before. Super disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taser

customer_reviews.title: Works well, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use when traveling, since I refuse to use the Keurig machines that are part of all the hotel's amenities I've been in lately. This does the job, and I've been very pleased. The design is simple, and effective.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Manzke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment with no stove, so this little burner fills the bill. It is small and easily stored when not in use. It heats quickly and fits a standard size saucepan. Its control doesn't show gradations of heat such as low, medium, and high, so one must experiment to assure successful cooking. Not a bad product at all, however.
customer_reviews.author: Frances K.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly and works great
customer_reviews.text: This little hot plate is terrific. I did not expect it to work so well or so fast. It is also quite compact for transport and storage. You do need to unplug it to be sure it is turned off, but that is no biggie. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Minneapolis Ms

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little burner
customer_reviews.text: Love this burner. We are remodeling our kitchen and so I have a small temporary kitchen. Instead of a stove and oven, I just have this single burner. I have ZERO complaints. We have used it just about everyday for 5 months now. Unbelievable value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but don’t expect it to heat a large frying pan high enough to deep fry. Bought to fry fish outdoors, not capable of getting oil hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Beat the more expensive one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a well-known brand earlier, claiming 1300 watts ( higher than this one). Nicer looking with flat top, however, it was just warm with highest setting. I had to return that one and purchased this one instead. This one only costs half of the one I returned but it does the job well. I have used this on my deck table multiple times, it have not disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Always Looking

customer_reviews.title: If you need something that gets hot fast, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for several months now, and it works really well for heating up quickly. However, if you need something with a good variable temperature, you might want to look elsewhere. The adjuster will turn on and off, but anything in between doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get as hot as traditional electric burners on a stove.
customer_reviews.author: D. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price tag I'm thrilled! Works great, dont expect to be able to fine tune the temperature. The knob doesnt have numbered settings so it's a guesstimate game. Overall I'll probably be ordering a second one to go with it. After reading the reviews I only have this plugged in when I'm using it and have never had a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this for making a quick egg or something then it's fine. I couldn't get it to maintain high heat to sear meat for a stew. Still came out really good but I like my meat seared. I do recommend it for low to medium cooking and simmering. Its gonna be a back burner.
customer_reviews.author: ANA. P

customer_reviews.title: i seared a steak on this burner 500 F
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cast iron skillet for searing steaks....work horse will get the pan up to 520 degree F...in the center of pan. I got a nice sear on the steaks.....good carmelization. its not a flame...but man i live in a loft without a stove. Little coil is a work horse. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fedor

customer_reviews.title: Camping breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Great product to take camping only wish it could be turned off without unplugging..
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty wimpy. Took 12+ minutes to boil a small pot of water for a single serving of mac and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: toolness1

customer_reviews.title: Heats up very fast; you may never need highest setting.
customer_reviews.text: With good quality cookware, this will boil water on the lowest setting and pop corn in a cast iron skillet at half-high heat. I've never turned it to highest setting since initial burn off (required per manufacturer's instruction sheet).
customer_reviews.author: AnitaJohn

customer_reviews.title: Great to cook "Smelly" foods outside.
customer_reviews.text: Know it's designed for indoor use, but under a covered patio, great for keeping powerful cooking odors out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: As others have written...this box has been roughly taped up suggesting that it was probably either used or previously returned. I'm not willing to take the chance since this is an electrical product.
customer_reviews.author: A reasonable person

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: If you're boiling something, this is fine. But if you're trying to maintain a consistent temperature over a period of time, not so much. Definitely good for backup use and will get the job done, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: The Bull

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job, but heat knob is a little ambiguous. As soon as you plug it in the light comes on. Even if you decrease the heat as far as possible the light is on. The entire unit gets HOT to the touch. So give it time before moving it after use.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Unknown
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay hot long enough to boil water. I don’t know if something happened during transit
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Wimberley

customer_reviews.title: Very handy when travelling
customer_reviews.text: We do have small kids and carrying this during vacation trips comes in much handy like warming some milk or food for the little ones. Gets warm pretty fast and small in size to fit in the check in bag
customer_reviews.author: Biplab

customer_reviews.title: You have to have it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product love it I used it everyday fast delivery and great service Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mangale_08

customer_reviews.title: For the price not bad
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine but found everyone's complaints true, no marking on low, med, high or warm and no off and on" you need to unplug it. Ordered this because I could not find my old one and finely found it has all the temperatures and on and off.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This thing does cannot boil or heat anything. It looks red hot and it feels hot, for some reason it still takes super long to cook. I'm confused if I did something wrong. The little light is always on whether I turn it off or on so I dont know if I even do it correctly. I do not like this purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: Good  burner
customer_reviews.text: Good extra burner for cooking large meals. Works with my little generator. Does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Carl

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough to recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does what I bought it for a purchased this as an emergency backup for our natural gas have used it a few times it gets the job done but its not ideal for cast iron
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for mobile home or extra house.
customer_reviews.text: I use gas in RV and home but this is a great electric burner to have.
customer_reviews.author: Suze P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: So we had a gas leak and our gas was shut off for the week while plumbers were fixing our problem. This thing definitely saved us! We managed to cook meals and saved us money from eating out! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: If you want a small portable with not much temp control this is for you, I have burnt up 2 pots so far so there is no variance between med and hot, but for the price, it does get hot.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so we could cook strong-odored or deep-fried food outside on the deck. We haven’t had a chance to use it yet. Will update if anything but good comes of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya J. Tjaden

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Works very good, and it’s easy to clean. I would buy another if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Bromar

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our stove quit working. It works fine. We can make anything on it that we can make on a stovetop. Inexpensive and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limited Firepower...
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to clean. Works great for cooking with a frying pan and small jobs, but can take 20 - 30 minutes to boil a saucepan half full of water. Once tried hard boiling eggs in a slightly larger pot and it took almost an hour to bring water to a boil. As long as you use it for what it is good at, you will probably be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dacino

customer_reviews.title: It’s suze
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to do the job and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and hot does not take a lot of space on the counter. The only thing we don’t like is that the red light stays on even when you’ve turned the dial to off.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Good heat range.
customer_reviews.text: Good heat...can get really hot when turned to high heat. Good temperature adjustments and burner element size.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury M

customer_reviews.title: Procter silex electric burner
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use this summer outside while it was on sale so I have only used it twice in side and it worked fine it heated up real fast and cleaned up real easy
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. It serves my purpose fine. The quality is good. Heavy duty it is not. But it will do the job it was designed to do cost effectively.
customer_reviews.author: rm100

customer_reviews.title: can't take apart for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because it can't be taken apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: Small, efficient and a good value. You can cook anything on this little stove that you can cook on a regular stove. And you won't need a degree from MIT to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Komplehx

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy resistance burner. I keep it in my shop for those projects where consistent heat is required. I also make coffee on it sometimes. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy old computer guy

customer_reviews.title: price was right. and it is well made. its really holding up pretty nicely.
customer_reviews.text: this is a good choice for these types of burners. ive had some really crappy ones. this one is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but to get the heat I want I have to always put it on high. And it doesn't heat up as quickly as I would like on other temperatures
customer_reviews.author: Toni Love

customer_reviews.title: Can Only Use For 1 Hour Out Of Every Two
customer_reviews.text: **BEWARE: This single burner has a warning BURIED in the instructions that it cannot be left on more than one hour in any two hour period!!! Do not purchase to use for extended buffet purposes or for anything that requires more than one hour max on the burner.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

product_meta.title: Proctor Silex Electric Single Burner, Compact and Portable, Adjustable Temperature Hot Plate, 1000 Watts, 120V, White & Stainless (34103)
product_meta.description: Style:1000 WattsA compact and powerful appliance that saves valuable counter space. The proctor Selex electric burner is a powerful and convenient portable burner. It is small, saving you valuable countertop space. An electric burner is perfect for vacation cabins, small apartments, and also provides an extra cooking surface for feeding a large group. Proctor Selex electric burners are affordable and sturdy appliances providing quick and sustained heat with an easy-to-use temperature-setting knob with low, medium, or high settings. The burner is also easy to clean, just wipe the chrome drip pan quickly and effortlessly. Voltage - 120V, Power- 1000W.
feature_bullets: Easy to Clean: The Burner Coil Lifts Up, Providing Easy Access to the Stainless Steel Drip Pan; The Drip Pan Wipes Clean With a Damp Cloth or Non Abrasive Sponge
Adjustable Temperature: Quickly Reaches and Sustains Heat With the Variable Temperature Knob, Which Can Be Adjusted Anywhere Between Low and High Heat Settings
Built in Safety Features: A Light on the Front of the Unit Reminds Users When the Unit Is Powered On; Non Skid Feet Ensure the Burner Stays Put During Use
Tested; Proven; Whatever Use You Find for It, Proctor Silex Burners Are Rigorously Tested for Durability and Reliability, so You’ll Get Great Results, Meal After Meal

Compact and Portable: the Petite Size of This Burner Makes It an Easy Tool to Take on the Go Wherever an Extra Cooking Surface Is Needed, From Tailgates to Vacation Homes or When Cooking for a Larger Crowd at Home
